archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: The Papers consist of notes, corrections and additions to the Concise Bibliography of the Works of Walt Whitmanby Goldsmith and Carolyn Wells.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Alfred F. Goldsmith Papers, 1922-1923, in the Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Accession #11118, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Transfer from Rare Book Division, Special Collections Department

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collections consists chiefly of corrections, additions, and other notes pertaining to the Concise bibliography of the Works of Walt Whitmanby Carolyn Wells and Alfred Goldsmith. There are related notes pertaining to an earlier Whitman bibliograph by Laurens Maynard and Adah Isaacs Menken, and some clipped notices.

did.unittitle: Notes pertaining to the Concise Bibliography of the Works of Walt Whitmanby Carolyn Wells and Alfred F. Goldsmith 1922

scopecontent.p: Included are a letter draft concerning errors in the bibliography, and related notes on Whitman bibliography by Laurens Maynard and Adah Isaacs Menken.

did.unittitle: Notes pertaining to Whitman bibliography, particularly re Leaves of Grassand Two Rivulets1922

scopecontent.p: Included are handwritten and typed notes on various first editions.

did.unittitle:
Printed material pertaining to Whitman bibliography and the Concise Bibliography of the Works of Walt Whitmanby Carolyn Wells and Alfred F. Goldsmith
1922-1923
